text: An election to Galway City Council took place on 27 June 1991 as part of that year's Irish local elections. 15 councillors were elected from three electoral divisions by PR-STV voting for a five-year term of office. ==Results by party== {| class=wikitable ! colspan=2 align=center|Party ! valign=top|Seats ! valign=top|± ! valign=top|First Pref. votes ! valign=top|FPv% ! valign=top|±% |- | align=right|4 | align=right|-2 | align=right|4,645 | align=right|27.37% | align=right| |- | align=right|4 | align=right|+4 | align=right|3,746 | align=right|22.07% | align=right| |- | align=right|4 | align=right|-1 | align=right|3,437 | align=right|20.25% | align=right| |- | align=right|2 | align=right|+1 | align=right|2,242 | align=right|13.21% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|- | align=right|2,121 | align=right|12.5% | align=right| |- | align=right|0 | align=right|-2 | align=right|484 | align=right|2.85% | align=right| |- | colspan=2 align=center|Totals | align=right |15 | align=center|- | align=right | | align=center|100% | align=center|— |} ==Results by Electoral Area== ===Galway No.1=== ===Galway No.2=== ===Galway No.3=== Category:1991 Irish local elections 1991
title: 1991 Galway City Council election
